contest-event.event-date:
Oct. 25, 1970 D Skelmersdale Contest (Section B)
Skelmersdale Contest (Section B) 20 Own Choice Test Piece Contest Skelmersdale Contest skelmersdale-contest-section-b
Brookfield School, Skelmersdale, Lancashire, England, UK Best cornet - Marple. Best horn - Pemberton Old. Best euphonium - Prescot. Best trombone - Christ Church. Prizes - 1st £20 and rose bowl, 2nd £12 and cup, 3rd £8 and cup. 9 bands competed. 3rd annual contest.
March 25, 2013, 10:30 p.m. June 18, 2016, 9:49 a.m.
1 Prescot Cables George Lawrenson Themes from Symphony No. 5 [Beethoven]
2 Trinity Girls Band Harry Oakes Youth Salutes a Master
3 Pemberton Old Wigan DW Band George Roby Othello
4 Christ Church (Bradford) Silver Ernie Wedgewood Labour and Love
Unknown Result Salford Silver J. H. Cooke Divertimento [Ball]
Unknown Result North Ashton Prize Les Naylor Little Suite for Brass [Arnold]
Unknown Result Marple Band Brent Large London River
Unknown Result Dobcross Silver Band George R. Gibson Snowdon Fantasy
Unknown Result Windsor Salford J. Clayton Divertimento [Ball]
Withdrawn Plessey (Liverpool) Works W. Howarth
Withdrawn Wigan & District A. G. Mason
